column6: (Equivalent to BMRT 11000) An introduction to the basic areas of business with an integrated perspective on how the various areas work together. Technological competencies and communicative skills will be developed. Team building opportunities will be announced. This course is open to any major. This course should be taken sometime during student's first 30 semester hours.
Special topics course that will be offered on a semester basis with different topics and different faculty.

column6: Learn how international business is affected by the forces of globalization: opportunities, threats and challenges that ensue from hyper competition, and the institutional checks and balances necessary to prevent complexity deteriorating into chaos.
